definition: A term commonly employed to refer to a specific category or classification of living organisms, typically used to describe distinct types of animals.

examples.english: The cat is a species of animal.

examples.german: Der Hund gehört zur Tierart der Säugetiere.
examples.english: The dog belongs to the species of mammals.

examples.german: Die Giraffe ist eine exotische Tierart.
examples.english: The giraffe is an exotic species of animal.

examples.german: Der Löwe zählt zu den Raubtierarten.
examples.english: The lion is one of the predator species.

examples.german: Die Eule ist eine nachtaktive Tierart.
examples.english: The owl is a nocturnal species of animal.
